caption:
Descending upon a castle, #McQueen’s SS25 campaign delves into the bold spirit of the banshee — an iconic figure woven into both the legacy of McQueen and the Irish heritage of its creative director, Seán McGirr.

The collection, which brings the banshee to life, features sharp, twisted tailoring paired with ethereal fabrics such as cobweb lace, pleated chiffon, and shredded silk organza. The color palette, a mix of ivory, silvered grey, and black, accented with bursts of yellow and orange, embodies the balance between strength and fragility.

Swipe for a glimpse of the campaign.

📸 Courtesy of @AlexanderMcQueen
